name: Candy Escape Pro - Slide puzzle
description:
Candy Escape Pro is a fun and addictive puzzle game. Red Candy is stuck between other candies and your goal is to make a way out for it by sliding other candies with minimal moves. There are thousands of levels categorised under easy, hard & expert category. Hundreds of hour fun.

Try it once and your will surely love this game.
